extension.description: Use this to install and update Diggz builds.

extension.summary: Watch Major American Television Networks Live for Free!
extension.description: Please visit https://www.tvaddons.ag for addon support! Watch Major American Television Networks Live! Entirely Legal and Free! You can also record content with a paid DVR account or by using DVR referral points. Signup for a free account through the following link today: http://watch.ustvnow.com

extension.news: [upd] Greek strings [Twilight0] [upd] Polish strings [Etharr] [upd] Finnish strings [teemue] [upd] Spanish strings [roliverosc] [fix/upd] resolve "Error Contents: 'q'" error [horstepipe] [fix/upd] resolve Play All/Play from here not starting playback [fix/upd] resolve playlists starting on second item [fix/upd] allow dash in quality choices [fix/upd] set content to files for menus, resolves mouse/scrolling [fix/upd] fix cipher [fix/upd] increase search history limit to 200 [fix/upd] storage db [add] Safe Search to Settings -> General [add] Thumbnail size to Settings -> General [add] Auto-play suggested [mehdilauters] [add] Automatic subtitles [Uukrull] [add] My Subscriptions (Filtered) - whitelist/blacklist version of My Subscriptions [chhe] [add] module extension point: add-ons can now add plugin.video.youtube dependency and resolve youtube video id's or make v3 api requests using the youtube plugin
extension.description: YouTube is one of the biggest video-sharing websites of the world.
YouTube ist eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.
YouTube jest jednym z największych na świecie serwisów udostępniania wideo.
A YouTube világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
YouTube es uno de los mayores sitios web de intercambio de vídeos del mundo.
Данное дополнение позволяет находить и смотреть видео на всеми любимом сайте.
YouTube est l'un des plus grands sites de partage vidéos du monde.
「Youtube」是全世界最大的影片分享網站
YouTube е един от най-големите уеб сайтове за споделяне на видео в целия свят.
Το YouTube είναι μία από τις μεγαλύτερες ιστοσελίδες διαμοιρασμού βίντεο στον κόσμο.
YouTube er en av verdens største nettsider for videodeling.

addon.name: [COLOR ff0084ff]T[/COLOR]HE[COLOR ff0084ff]P[/COLOR]O[COLOR ff0084ff]R[/COLOR]TAL
addon.provider-name: Modded by [COLOR FF8ABEE2]Open[/COLOR][COLOR FF757677]ELEQ[/COLOR], original work by phil65

extension.description: This script offers various possibilities to display online content inside skins as well as a complete MovieDB browser including info dialogs for various media types. Used services are themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com and a lot more. Needs skin implementation for lot of functions. Uses [COLOR ff0084ff]M[/COLOR]etalli[COLOR ff0084ff]Q[/COLOR] for playback and library functions.

Dit script biedt meerdere mogelijkheden om online content weer te geven in skins en bevat ook een complete MovieDB browser inclusief info dialogen voor verscheidene media types. Gebruikte diensten zijn themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com en nog veel meer. Vereist skin implementatie voor de meeste functies. Gebruikt [COLOR ff0084ff]M[/COLOR]etalli[COLOR ff0084ff]Q[/COLOR] voor afspeel en bibliotheek functies.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: Please visit https://www.tvaddons.ag for addon support! The USTVnow Guide provides an EPG for the USTVnow Plus addon. Signup for a free account through the following link today: http://watch.ustvnow.com
extension.disclaimer: The USTVnow Guide is based on the FTV Guide by rayw1986 and bluezed which is based on the original TV Guide addon by twinther.
